headline: Consoles to power videogame market growth until 2027 on 'GTA VI', Switch boost
summary: Videogame consoles are likely to bethe biggest growth driver in the market until 2027, researchfirm Newzoo said on Monday, citing strong expected sales forTake-Two's upcoming Grand Theft Auto VI...
